name: CP_Phase2_Comments_1

items.name: MyAssetPushConfig
items.instruction: Manually configure pipeline XML files on application server if necessary.

items.name: LAALEventProcessor
items.instruction: Manually enable and set to read events

items.name: Test Alco
items.instruction: Enable and test connectivity. Configuration properties changes may be required.
Enable, set to read events and verify event triggers.

items.name: stepsys
items.instruction: Users created on target systems use temporary password. Reset manually if passwords are managed by STEP.

items.name: Asset URL Key
items.instruction: Deactivate before installation and activate after installation.

items.name: ALCO - Change Package Back From Git
items.instruction: Enable and verify linked business rules are included.

items.name: Product Sufficiency
items.instruction: Manually enable and set to read events

items.name: Product Sufficiency User
items.instruction: Users created on target systems use temporary password. Reset manually if passwords are managed by STEP.

items.name: KRMA Web UI
items.instruction: Impact analysis not available. Verify linked business rules and workflows exist on target system plus everything used for configuration.

items.name: testALCO_CPOUt
items.instruction: Enable, set to read events and verify event triggers, if queue-based. Verify linked business rules are included.

items.name: Asset Attribute With Space In Name
eCatalogs
items.instruction: Price/Terms List/Collections from Lists must be recreated manually. Ignore impact analysis.

  <BusinessLibraries>
    <BusinessRule ID="myLib" Type="Library">

<!-- Definition:
<config>
  <javaScript>
function test() {
	var x = 2;
	return x;
}

  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Libraries"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">myLib</Name>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="false"/>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessLibraries>

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="Joiner" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="joinerSource" type="OutboundBusinessProcessorJoinerSource" contract="OutboundBusinessProcessorJoinerSourceBindContract"/>
    <binding alias="joinerResult" type="OutboundBusinessProcessorJoinerResult" contract="OutboundBusinessProcessorJoinerResultBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
// Joiner Source bound joinerSource
// Joiner Result bound to joinerResult

function appendFromGroup(messageGroup) {
  var seen = [];
  var first = true;
  while(joinerSource.hasNext(messageGroup)) {
    var messageString = joinerSource.getNextMessage(messageGroup);
    var hash = messageString.hashCode();
    if (seen.indexOf(hash) == -1) {
      seen.push(hash);
      if (first) {
        first = false;
      } else {
        joinerResult.appendToMessage(",");
      }
      joinerResult.appendToMessage(messageString);
    }
  }
}

joinerResult.appendToMessage("{\"products\":{\"upsert\":[");
appendFromGroup("upsert");
joinerResult.appendToMessage("],\"delete\":[");
appendFromGroup("delete");
joinerResult.appendToMessage("]}}");
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Joiner</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="CheckChangePackage" Scope="Global" Type="Condition" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Condition #1 (JavaScriptBusinessConditionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings/>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
throw "STOP IT!";
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">CheckChangePackage</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="ELFRBGPlist" Scope="Global" Type="Function" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Function #1 (JavaScriptBusinessFunctionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="step" type="Manager" contract="ManagerBindContract"/>
    <binding alias="logger" type="Logger" contract="LoggerBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <functionparameters>
    <functionparameter alias="bgpid" type="String" contract="StringBindContract"/>
  </functionparameters>
  <returntype type="java.lang.String"/>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var dir = new java.io.File('/shared/workarea/background-processarea/' + bgpid)
var files = dir.listFiles()
if (!files) {
	files = []
	files.push(dir)
}

var tmp = (dir.getName() + '').split('/')
var fileToPrint = tmp[tmp.length - 1]

files.forEach(function(f) {
	logger.info((f.isDirectory()?'d':(f.isFile()?'f':'UnknownType')) + ' ' + f)	
	if (f.isFile() &&  fileToPrint == f.getName()) {
		var sb = new java.lang.StringBuilder()
		var br = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.FileReader(f))
		while (br.ready()) {
			//logger.info(br.readLine())
			sb.append(br.readLine())
		}
		br.close()
		logger.info(sb.toString())
	}
})
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="ELFRBRGroup"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRBGPlist</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>

<!-- Definition:
<scxml name="MaintainItem" initial="Initial" version="0.9">
  <assignee id="$current" type="user"/>
  <editorLayout>   node-size-and-position x=0.0 y=0.0 w=140.0 h=238.0  </editorLayout>
  <final id="Final" discontinued="false">
    <editorLayout>   node-size-and-position x=20.0 y=193.0 w=100.0 h=25.0  </editorLayout>
    <onentry businessactionid="RemoveFromWorkflow"/>
  </final>
  <state id="Initial" discontinued="false">
    <transition target="Maintain"/>
    <editorLayout>   node-size-and-position x=20.0 y=43.0 w=100.0 h=25.0  </editorLayout>
  </state>
  <state id="Maintain" discontinued="false">
    <transition target="Final"/>
    <editorLayout>   node-size-and-position x=20.0 y=118.0 w=100.0 h=25.0  </editorLayout>
  </state>
</scxml> -->
      <BusinessRuleLink ID="RemoveFromWorkflow"/>
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Workflows"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Maintain Item</Name>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
    </STEPWorkflow>
  </STEPWorkflows>
